MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the DG11 postcode area of Lockerbie. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:30am to repair a damaged overhead line caused by a third party and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:33am on the 9th of April 2021.
